full_summary:
================================

**Flow Cytometer System Tender Announcement**

**Tender Reference:** WS3819229454 / Doc3833458260

**Date Published:** January 19, 2023
**Tender Close Date:** February 13, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)

This is an amendment to the original tender announcement for the supply of a Flow Cytometer System. The National Research Council of Canada (NRC), through the Aquatic and Crop Resource Development Centre, requires the following goods:

* One (1) Flow Cytometer System
* One (1) Acquisition Software Device License
* The option to purchase:
	+ One (1) violet laser (405 nm)
	+ One (1) plate loader module
	+ Eight (8) additional fluorescence detection channels, compatible with violet and blue lasers

Goods must be delivered on or before March 31, 2023. Installation and training on site are also required.

**Bid Requirements:**

* All bids must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation.
* Bids must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be considered responsive.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Amendment:**

Please disregard the original closing time as published on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by February 13, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST). Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:
